original_text: I speak what is true about myself. The Father, who sent me, also speaks what is true about me.’
korean_text: 내가 나를 위하여 증언하는 자가 되고 나를 보내신 아버지도 나를 위하여 증언하시느니라

sentences.original_text: I speak what is true about myself.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 나 자신에 대해 참된 것을 말합니다.

sentences.original_text: also speaks what is true about me.
